cyclone.name: ROSLYN
cyclone.current_location: about 155 miles SSW of Cabo Corrientes, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to turn north then accelerate NNE, making landfall along the coast of the Mexican state of Nayarit and then moving inland toward interior west-central Mexico.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: coast of Nayarit, Mexico (near San Blas/El Roblito area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from north of El Roblito to Mazatlán, Mexico
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from Playa Pérula to El Roblito, including Las Islas Marías; Tropical-Storm Warning south of Playa Pérula to Manzanillo and north of El Roblito to Mazatlán
weather_observation.impacted_coast: South-western and west-central Mexico from Michoacán through Jalisco, Colima and Nayarit to southern Sinaloa
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: Not listed (no Gulf-side station in table)
